resources.string:
Podcast about game development from Galyonkin.com, now called «How Games Are Made».

 Hosts — Sergei Galyonkin и Michael Kuzmin.

 Podcast «How Games Are Made» — is what used to be called «popular science radio program»". In human language we try to talk about game development for people who are either already making games, or just starting to do it.

 Podcast is released almost every week on Thursdays and is live streamed on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Kuzmitch
